m_szDocTitle: Patent EP2395583A1 - Negative active material for a lithium battery - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Negative active material for a lithium battery EP 2395583 A1 Abstract The present invention refers to a negative active material including or being composed of a linear acetylenic carbon allotrope. Images(8)   Claims(12) A negative active material comprising: a carbonaceous material including or being composed of a linear acetylenic carbon allotrope. The negative active material of claim 1, wherein the carbonaceous material is in the form of spherical particles. The negative active material of claim 2, wherein an average particle diameter of the spherical particles is in a range of 20 to 50 Âµ
